policy_info.insurance_company_name: Bajaj Allianz General Insurance Co. Ltd.

limit_details.description: Covered up to Sum Insured as part of in-patient hospitalization or day care procedures. Subject to waiting periods.

covered_treatments: Modern Treatment Methods and Advancement in Technologies
cancer.waiting_period_months: Surgery on all internal or external tumours/ cysts/ nodules/polyps... with exception of Malignant tumor or growth
conditions_and_notes: Covered under In-patient Hospitalization or Day Care Procedures.
If cancer is a Pre-Existing Disease (PED), a 36-month waiting period applies (Page 20, Excl01).
Specific surgeries for malignant tumors are subject to a 24-month waiting period (Page 21, Excl02, item 18).
Expenses traceable to childbirth, miscarriage (unless due to an Accident), and lawful medical termination of pregnancy are excluded under domestic cover (Page 22, Excl18).
Ectopic pregnancy IS covered (as an exception to Excl18 on Page 22).
Subject to a 24-month specified disease waiting period.
Covered under Day Care Procedures or In-patient treatment up to Sum Insured.

limit_details.description: Covered up to Sum Insured as part of in-patient care.

conditions_and_notes: Covered if Medically Necessary due to chronic kidney disease (subject to 24-month waiting period for CKD) or acute conditions (subject to 30-day initial waiting period).

cancer.details: As per general policy exclusions (e.g., Page 5, Def 45 for Unproven/Experimental Treatment).

cancer.type_or_condition: Congenital external diseases or defects or anomalies related to cancer if not disclosed and covered as PED.
cancer.details: As per general exclusions (Page 23, item 7), unless specifically covered after PED waiting period.

maternity.condition: Medical Treatment Expenses traceable to childbirth (including complicated deliveries and caesarean sections incurred during Hospitalization)
maternity.notes: Page 22, Excl18. Ectopic pregnancy is an exception and IS covered.

maternity.condition: Expenses towards lawful medical termination of pregnancy during the Policy Period
Sterility and Infertility treatments (e.g., IVF, ZIFT, GIFT, ICSI)
Assisted Reproduction services, Gestational Surrogacy, Reversal of sterilization

cataract.condition: Treatment for correction of eye sight due to refractive error less than 7.5 dioptres.
cataract.details: Page 22, Excl15. This is a general refractive error exclusion; applies if cataract surgery is primarily for refractive correction below this threshold.

cataract.condition: Use of special/advanced lenses beyond standard monofocal IOL if costs exceed reasonable and customary charges for standard treatment or overall Sum Insured.
cataract.details: Policy does not specify differential coverage for lens types. Coverage is within overall limits. Advanced lenses might lead to out-of-pocket expenses if they exceed what's considered reasonable/customary for a standard procedure or if the total bill exceeds SI.

dialysis.condition: Dialysis for Chronic Kidney Disease if diagnosed/treated within the 24-month specified disease waiting period (or 36-month PED waiting period if pre-existing).
dialysis.details: Based on waiting period clauses on Page 20 (Excl01) and Page 21 (Excl02, item 25).
Falls under 'Unproven Treatments' (Page 22, Excl16 / Page 5, Def 45).
